description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
name: System Scripts Autorun Keys Modification
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Software\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\\System\\Scripts* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Startup* OR *\\Shutdown* OR *\\Logon* OR *\\Logoff*)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:"\(Empty\)")))
author: Victor Sergeev
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
